text: Melicope hawaiensis, or manena, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rutaceae, that is endemic to the Hawaiian Islands. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== hawaiensis Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Biota of Hawaii (island) Category:Biota of Lanai Category:Biota of Maui Category:Biota of Molokai Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Melicope hawaiensis
